DOC.brief_summary: Do specific verbal and tactile cues and instructions help people who perform bridging exercises to improve hip muscle strength to optimize recruitment of the gluteus maximus muscle?
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Cueing on Gluteus Maximus Recruitment
DOC.criteria: female 1840 years of age normal muscle strength in lower extremities evidence of patellofemoral pain syndrome evidence of femoracetabular impingement evidence of mechanical low back pain causing radicular (lower extremity) symptoms history of previous hip or knee ligament injury history of lower extremity trauma history of lower extremity surgery history of neurological conditions that impair motor function current lower extremity pain that limits functional activities
